alert.note: Alert for Brown; Watonwan (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:29PM CDT until July 05 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Brown County in south central Minnesota... North central Watonwan County in south central Minnesota... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Hanska, or 16 miles southwest of New Ulm, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hanska. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
